game.title: The Lost Artifact
game.objective: Retrieve the lost artifact from the Ancient Ruins
game.description: An ancient artifact has been stolen from the city museum. Rumors suggest that it has been taken to the Ancient Ruins. Your task is to retrieve the artifact and return it to the museum.
game.reward: 500 gold coins and a legendary weapon

task.description: Use your horse to reach the entrance of the Ancient Ruins
Search the Ancient Ruins for the stolen artifact. Be careful, the ruins are full of traps!

task.objective: Return the artifact to the museum
task.description: Once you have found the artifact, return it to the city museum. The mayor will be waiting for you there.
